info.title: AssetEquipment Webservice
info.description:
- **Sample {id} parameter value**: ASSETCODE1#ORG1 
 - **POST/PUT webservice request construction tip**: Copy content of **AssetEquipment** element from **GET** webservice response and use it as a **template**
